Detailed Description

Class communicating with the AdServerPlugin in the Java code. Responsable with setting ad server configurations and requesting certain actions.

Member Function Documentation

bool acp_utils::modules::AdManager::HideBanner ( )
static

Hide the banner shown. Does nothing if banner is not shown.

Returns
True if the banner was on, and was hidden... false otherwise.

void acp_utils::modules::AdManager::MarkPAU ( bool  isPau)
static

Notify the ad server the status of the current user (paying/non-paying) For paying users, ads should not be displayed.

Parameters
